description:
Misanaria Bolenan, better known as Mia, is the youngest elf of Bolenan Forest and the daughter of Lamisauya (Laya) and Lilinatoa (Lia). She was abducted by http://anidb.net/ch96005 [Zen] in order to unseal http://anidb.net/ch96007 [Trazayuya]`s Cradle. After http://anidb.net/ch91583 [Satou] saved her, he promised to take her home, and they have travelled together ever since.
Source: Death March Wikia
name: Misanaria Bolenan
